async function trimTextToFitWidth(
  textElement: SVGTextElement,
  maxWidth: number,
  originText: string = ''
) {
  let text = originText;
  const ellipsis = 'Â·Â·Â·';

  const isTooWide = (str: string) = {
    textElement.textContent = str;
    return textElement.getComputedTextLength()  maxWidth;
  };

  // í…ìŠ¤íŠ¸ê°€ maxWidthë¥¼ ë„˜ëŠ”ì§€ check

  // maxWidth ì´ë‚´ì— ê°€ì¥ ë ê¸€ìë¥¼ ë°”ì´ë„ˆë¦¬ ì„œì¹˜ë¡œ íƒìƒ‰
  let start = 0;
  let end = text.length;
  while (start  end) {
    let mid = Math.floor((start + end) / 2);
    if (isTooWide(text.slice(0, mid) + ellipsis)) {
      end = mid;
    } else {
      start = mid + 1;
    }
  }

  // ê°€ì¥ ë ê¸€ìë¥¼ ì§€ìš°ê³  ë§ì¤„ì„í‘œ ì¶”ê°€
  textElement.textContent = text.slice(0, start - 1) + ellipsis;
}

    textElement.textContent = str;

    if (isTooWide(text.slice(0, mid) + ellipsis)) {
